content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'landing_lrsstoragegabarito01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [landing_lrsstoragegabarito01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://landing@lrsstoragegabarito01.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.diabetes (
	[C1] nvarchar(4000),
	[C2] nvarchar(4000),
	[C3] nvarchar(4000),
	[C4] nvarchar(4000),
	[C5] nvarchar(4000),
	[C6] nvarchar(4000),
	[C7] nvarchar(4000),
	[C8] nvarchar(4000),
	[C9] nvarchar(4000),
	[C10] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'empodera/diabetes.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [landing_lrsstoragegabarito01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.diabetes
GO
